00003 inline comple& _zrovector::operator()(const long& i) const
00004 {VERBOSE_REPORT;
00005 #ifdef  CPPL_DEBUG
00006   if( i<0 || l<=i ){

00012 #endif//CPPL_DEBUG

00015 }

00036 inline void _zrovector::write(const char* filename) const
00037 {VERBOSE_REPORT;
00038   std::ofstream ofs(filename, std::ios::trunc);
00039   ofs.setf(std::cout.flags());
00040   ofs.precision(std::cout.precision());
00041   ofs.width(std::cout.width());
00042   ofs.fill(std::cout.fill());
00043   
00044   ofs << "#zrovector" << " " << l << std::endl;
00045   for(long i=0; i<l; i++){
00046     ofs << operator()(i) << " ";
00047   }
00048   ofs << std::endl;
00049   
00050   ofs.close();
00051   destroy();
00052 }
